A new semester, a new course

Welcome to the new Spring semester, and the COMP 441 course in Human-Computer Interface Design.

Please ensure that you check this website each week for new posts, notes, and material.

I shall also post each week’s assignment to this website’s assignments & coursework page.

My contact details can be found on the faculty page at the CS department website, or using the link in the left sidebar.
